name: Time Doesn't Last
description:
Welcome to Time Doesn’t Last! A game where you try to score points by destroying as many enemies as possible within the time limit! When the on-screen timer completes one full revolution, you lose.
But there’s a twist!

You also can push back the on-screen timer to keep extending the time you have indefinitely,

hypothetically.

Balance between reducing time till death and destroying enemies by holding the left mouse button to switch between the two phases (you can’t push back time and destroy enemies at the same time)!
As time till death reduces, you will also score more points when you destroy enemies.
